name: OddHistory
0:
”Alexa, open Odd History”
”Alexa, ask Odd History for a fact”
”Give me an Odd History fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: odd history
des: This simple skill gives you a random odd history fact. Get started by saying 'Alexa open odd history.’ You can then say 'tell me an odd history fact' or ‘give me a fact’ to receive facts one by one.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
